snippet.title: Night Loops - Trailer
snippet.description:
Night Loops is an adventure, puzzle game about escaping a hotel within a time loop ꩜

On an unnumbered floor, below the very hotel you work the night shift, there lies a shadowy mansion. Can you come to terms with what its chambers reveal? Explore dreamlike worlds, solve puzzles, and lose your sense of Self while reliving the time before dawn in this dark, adventure game.

Wishlist on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1826060/Night_Loops/

By Jiaquarium https://twitter.com/jiaquarium
Original soundtrack by s3-z https://www.instagram.com/salmorenoj.art/
Add'l art & design by Estella https://www.instagram.com/e4ennui/

Thank you and enjoy~
